home.title: Welcome to Rock Paper Scissors!
home.descriptionP1: Here you have the opportunity to play Rock Paper Scissors using your camera.
home.descriptionP3: After clicking the Play button, you will be taken to the next page where you will see your camera image, the AI's assessment of which symbol you are showing, and a trigger button.
home.descriptionP4: When the trigger button is pressed, a 5-second timer starts. The prediction made by the AI after this timer expires will be used.
home.descriptionP5: For the computer as your opponent, a random value is generated to determine the result.
home.descriptionP6: This will then be displayed on the results page. There you will also see your overall score.
home.rules: Rock beats scissors, scissors cut paper, paper wraps rock.
